column1: declaration being made. A Section 5(1) declaration issued in terms of Section 41 on the
other hand, would attract a higher level of scrutiny by Courts, owing to the fact that
the  landowner  has  been  deprived  of  an  opportunity  to  be  heard.  Therefore,  I  am  of
the  view  that  a  Section  5(1)  declaration  made
column2: in  terms  of  Section  41  cannot  be

column1: afforded the sanctity conferred by Section 5(2).
